021import net.tnemc.item.AbstractItemStack;
022import net.tnemc.item.JSONHelper;
023import net.tnemc.item.component.SerialComponent;
024import net.tnemc.item.platform.ItemPlatform;
025import org.json.simple.JSONObject;
026
027import java.util.ArrayList;
028import java.util.Arrays;
029import java.util.List;
030import java.util.Objects;
031
032/**
033 * ModelDataComponent
034 *
035 * @see <a href="https://minecraft.wiki/w/Data_component_format#custom_model_data">Minecraft Reference</a>
036 * <p>
037 * Note: Paper API v 1.21.4
038 * @author creatorfromhell
039 * @since 0.2.0.0
040 */
041public abstract class ModelDataComponent<I extends AbstractItemStack<T>, T> implements SerialComponent<I, T> {
042
043  protected final List<String> colours = new ArrayList<>();
044  protected final List<Float> floats = new ArrayList<>();
045  protected final List<Boolean> flags = new ArrayList<>();
046  protected final List<String> strings = new ArrayList<>();
047
048  public ModelDataComponent() {
049
050  }
051
052  public ModelDataComponent(final List<String> colours, final List<Float> floats, final List<Boolean> flags, final List<String> strings) {
053
054    this.colours.addAll(colours);
055    this.floats.addAll(floats);
056    this.flags.addAll(flags);
057    this.strings.addAll(strings);
058  }
059
060  /**
061   * @return the type of component this is.
062   */
063  @Override
064  public String identifier() {
065    return "model-data";
066  }
067
068  /**
069   * Converts this component's data to a JSON object.
070   *
071   * @return The JSONObject representing this component's data.
072   */
073  @Override
074  public JSONObject toJSON() {
075    final JSONObject json = new JSONObject();
076    json.put("colours", colours);
077    json.put("floats", floats);
078    json.put("flags", flags);
079    json.put("strings", strings);
080    return json;
081  }
082
083  /**
084   * Reads JSON data and converts it back to this component's data.
085   *
086   * @param json      The JSONHelper instance of the json data.
087   * @param platform  The ItemPlatform instance.
088   */
089  @Override
090  public void readJSON(final JSONHelper json, final ItemPlatform<I, T> platform) {
091    colours.clear();
092    colours.addAll(json.getStringList("colours"));
093
094    floats.clear();
095    floats.addAll(json.getFloatList("floats"));
096
097    flags.clear();
098    flags.addAll(json.getBooleanList("flags"));
099
100    strings.clear();
101    strings.addAll(json.getStringList("strings"));
102  }
103
104  /**
105   * Used to determine if some data is equal to this data. This means that it has to be an exact
106   * copy of this data.
107   *
108   * @param component The component to compare.
109   * @return True if similar, otherwise false.
110   */
111  @Override
112  public boolean equals(final SerialComponent<I, T> component) {
113    if (!(component instanceof final ModelDataComponent<?, ?> other)) return false;
114    return Objects.equals(this.colours, other.colours) &&
115           Objects.equals(this.floats, other.floats) &&
116           Objects.equals(this.flags, other.flags) &&
117           Objects.equals(this.strings, other.strings);
118  }
119
120  @Override
121  public int hashCode() {
122    return Objects.hash(colours, floats, flags, strings);
123  }
124
125  public List<String> colours() {
126
127    return colours;
128  }
129
130  public void colours(final List<String> colours) {
131
132    this.colours.clear();
133    this.colours.addAll(colours);
134  }
135
136  public void colours(final String... colours) {
137
138    this.colours.clear();
139    this.colours.addAll(Arrays.asList(colours));
140  }
141
142  public List<Float> floats() {
143
144    return floats;
145  }
146
147  public void floats(final List<Float> floats) {
148
149    this.floats.clear();
150    this.floats.addAll(floats);
151  }
152
153  public void floats(final Float... floats) {
154
155    this.floats.clear();
156    this.floats.addAll(Arrays.asList(floats));
157  }
158
159  public List<Boolean> flags() {
160
161    return flags;
162  }
163
164  public void flags(final List<Boolean> flags) {
165
166    this.flags.clear();
167    this.flags.addAll(flags);
168  }
169
170  public void flags(final Boolean... flags) {
171
172    this.flags.clear();
173    this.flags.addAll(Arrays.asList(flags));
174  }
175
176  public List<String> strings() {
177
178    return strings;
179  }
180
181  public void strings(final List<String> strings) {
182
183    this.strings.clear();
184    this.strings.addAll(strings);
185  }
186
187  public void strings(final String... strings) {
188
189    this.strings.clear();
190    this.strings.addAll(Arrays.asList(strings));
191  }
192}
